survey_name: Community Feedback on Public Bicycle Sharing Program
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the city's public bicycle sharing program to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the city's public bicycle sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for clarity. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the city's public bicycle sharing program?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the public bicycle sharing program? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'
questions.client_notes: Checkbox format for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice (checkbox) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the public bicycle sharing program? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycles at stations when you need them?
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question. Ensure balanced positive/negative options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycles at stations when you need them?
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the public bicycle sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-ended (text input with character limit)

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the public bicycle sharing program?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any safety concerns while using the public bicycles?

questions.client_notes: Binary response with optional follow-up if 'Yes' selected.
